document_data.name: Queen Besmra
document_data.mainbody: '''''Queen Besmra''''' was a ship in the [[Cormyr]]ian navy in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Etymology: The ''Queen Besmra'' followed the standard naming customs of official Cormyrean naval ships, being named for one of the nation's rulers. In its case, the ship was named for [[Besmra Obarskyr]],
